messages.content: Your job is to structure recipe data into JSON. I will give you the text of a recipe.  I would like you to convert it into structured JSON following these rules. 1 - Maintain the original text and intent of the recipe whenever possible. 2 - Create a new step whenever the recipe asks us to measure time, switch equipment, change contexts, or whenever it otherwise makes intuitive sense. 3 - Favor more simple steps over fewer, more involved steps. 4 - Ignore existing headers and other stray content that may have been pasted into the recipe by accident. 5 - Respond in the following JSON format: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "$id": "http://parsley.stufleisher.com/recipeGenerated.schema.json", "type": "object", "properties": { "name": { "type": "string" }, "owner": { "type": "string" }, "description": { "type": "string" }, "sourceName": { "type": "string" }, "steps": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "stepNumber": { "type": "integer" }, "instructions": { "type": "string" }, "ingredients": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "amount": { "type": "string" }, "description": { "type": "string" }, "instructionRef": { "type": "string" } }, "additionalProperties": false, "required": ["amount", "description", "instructionRef"] } } }, "additionalProperties": false, "required": ["stepNumber", "ingredients", "instructions"] } }, "tags": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "name": { "type": "string" } }, "additionalProperties": false, "required": ["name"] } } }, "additionalProperties": false, "required": ["name", "owner", "description", "sourceName", "steps", "tags"] }.

messages.message:
{"ingredients":["½ teaspoon Sichuan peppercorns, toasted and cooled","1 (14- to 17-ounce) package tofu (not silken), rinsed","3 tablespoons peanut or vegetable oil","5 ounces ground pork butt (not lean; ⅔ cup)","2½ tablespoons toban jiang (hot bean sauce)","1 tablespoon fermented black beans, rinsed, drained, and chopped","2 teaspoons Sichuan chili powder","1 cup chicken stock or reduced-sodium chicken broth","2 teaspoon soy sauce","1 teaspoon sugar","1 tablespoons cornstarch","4 teaspoons water","4 scallions, chopped (½ cup)"],"instructions":"Grind peppercorns in grinder and set aside.
Cut tofu into ¾-inch cubes and pat dry.
Heat wok over high heat until it begins to smoke, then pour oil down side and swirl to coat bottom and side. Stir-fry pork until no longer pink. Add bean sauce, black beans, and chile powder and stir-fry 1 minute. Stir in stock, soy sauce, sugar, tofu, and a pinch of salt. Simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir together cornstarch and water until smooth.
Stir cornstarch slurry mixture into stir-fry and simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 1 minute. Stir in scallions and simmer 1 minute. Serve sprinkled with Sichuan pepper.
Serve with rice."}

instructionRef":"Grind peppercorns in grinder and set aside."}]},{"stepNumber":2,"instructions":"Cut tofu into ¾-inch cubes and pat dry.","ingredients":[{"amount":"1 (14- to 17-ounce) package","description":"tofu (not silken), rinsed","instructionRef":"Cut tofu into ¾-inch cubes and pat dry."}]},{"stepNumber":3,"instructions":"Heat wok over high heat until it begins to smoke, then pour oil down side and swirl to coat bottom and side.","ingredients":[{"amount":"3 tablespoons","description":"peanut or vegetable oil","instructionRef":"Heat wok over high heat until it begins to smoke, then pour oil down side and swirl to coat bottom and side."}]},{"stepNumber":4,"instructions":"Stir-fry pork until no longer pink.","ingredients":[{"amount":"5 ounces","description":"ground pork butt (not lean; ⅔ cup)","instructionRef":"Stir-fry pork until no longer pink."}]},{"stepNumber":5,"instructions":"Add bean sauce, black beans, and chile powder and stir-fry 1 minute.","ingredients":[{"amount":"2½ tablespoons","description":"toban jiang (hot bean sauce)","instructionRef":"Add bean sauce, black beans, and chile powder and stir-fry 1 minute."},{"amount":"1 tablespoon","description":"fermented black beans, rinsed, drained, and chopped","instructionRef":"Add bean sauce, black beans, and chile powder and stir-fry 1 minute."},{"amount":"2 teaspoons","description":"Sichuan chili powder","instructionRef":"Add bean sauce, black beans, and chile powder and stir-fry 1 minute."}]},{"stepNumber":6,"instructions":"Stir in stock, soy sauce, sugar, tofu, and a pinch of salt. Simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 5 minutes.","ingredients":[{"amount":"1 cup","description":"chicken stock or reduced-sodium chicken broth","instructionRef":"Stir in stock, soy sauce, sugar, tofu, and a pinch of salt. Simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 5 minutes."},{"amount":"2 teaspoon","description":"soy sauce","instructionRef":"Stir in stock, soy sauce, sugar, tofu, and a pinch of salt. Simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 5 minutes."},{"amount":"1 teaspoon","description":"sugar","instructionRef":"Stir in stock, soy sauce, sugar, tofu, and a pinch of salt. Simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 5 minutes."},{"amount":"1 (14- to 17-ounce) package","description":"tofu (not silken), rinsed","instructionRef":"Stir in stock, soy sauce, sugar, tofu, and a pinch of salt. Simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 5 minutes."}]},{"stepNumber":7,"instructions":"Meanwhile, stir together cornstarch and water until smooth.","ingredients":[{"amount":"1 tablespoon","description":"cornstarch","instructionRef":"Meanwhile, stir together cornstarch and water until smooth."},{"amount":"4 teaspoons","description":"water","instructionRef":"Meanwhile, stir together cornstarch and water until smooth."}]},{"stepNumber":8,"instructions":"Stir cornstarch slurry mixture into stir-fry and simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 1 minute.","ingredients":[{"amount":"1 tablespoon","description":"cornstarch","instructionRef":"Stir cornstarch slurry mixture into stir-fry and simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 1 minute."},{"amount":"4 teaspoons","description":"water","instructionRef":"Stir cornstarch slurry mixture into stir-fry and simmer, gently stirring occasionally, 1 minute."}]},{"stepNumber":9,"instructions":"Stir in scallions and simmer 1 minute.","ingredients":[{"amount":"4 scallions, chopped (½ cup)","description":"scallions","instructionRef":"Stir in scallions and simmer 1 minute."}]},{"stepNumber":10,"instructions":"Serve sprinkled with Sichuan pepper.","ingredients":[{"amount":"½ teaspoon","description":"Sichuan peppercorns, toasted and cooled","instructionRef":"Serve sprinkled with Sichuan pepper."}]},{"stepNumber":11,"instructions":"Serve with rice.","ingredients":null}],"tags":[{"name":"Sichuan"},{"name":"Tofu"},{"name":"Spicy"},{"name":"Chinese"}]}
